title: More Companies Drop From GDC and PAX East - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.25.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about the hits that keep on coming as Coronavirus fears continue to cause companies to drop out from events.

Time Stamps - 
00:04:15 - Housekeeping
Zelda In Review Premieres NEXT TUESDAY on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:57 - EA pulls out of GDC over coronavirus fears
00:12:23 - Capcom Developers and Square Enix pull out of PAX East
00:14:00 - “Does GDC get canceled?” - Jeffrey P. Long
00:18:58 - A FIFA Pro Has Been Permanently Banned From All EA Games
00:26:02 - Etika has been memorialized as a Pokestop
00:28:39 - A Resident Evil 3 Demo is on the way
00:29:23 - Out today
00:38:32 -  The Besties
00:39:51 - Gaming Ride Home  
 Reader mail   -
00:41:10 - “Do you think smart delivery will support discs?” - Lexus
00:46:10 - “There’s a rumored Overwatch animated series coming…” - Ricky Mcflyy
00:52:18 - Squad Up: Caleb Sitler - PS4/Xbox - SuperSitler - Wizard World Cleveland
00:53:10 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/392TtwI 
00:53:43 - You‘re Wrong
00:56:55 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
